import { Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './routes.module.scss' import Main from './Main' import Layout from 'layout' import BookDetail from './BookDetail' import Cart from './Cart' import User from './Mypage' import WishList from './WishList' import store from 'store' import { themeState } from 'states/system' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { useEffect } from 'react' const App = () => { const [theme, setTheme] = useRecoil(themeState) if (!store.get('searchStore')) { store.set('searchStore', []) } if (!store.get('likeStore')) { store.set('likeStore', []) } if (!store.get('cartStore')) { store.set('cartStore', []) } useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.setAttribute('color-theme', theme) }) return (
}> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> Not Found
} />
) } export default App
